readable.title: 2170222061_e8bce4a32d
readable.content: A dog biting the tail of a cow . A dog chasing an animals tail on the grass . A small animal leaps behind a larger animal , the larger animal 's tail obscuring the smaller one 's face . A small dog chases after a large brown cow . A tan animal is being swatted in the face by a brown and white bull .
